Presenting Complaints (Symptoms): Preoccupation with untoward happenings in future:NA; Racing heart, Sweaty Palms: NA
History: The patient reports that whenever she is driving, she gets thoughts about meeting with an accident. She does not consider the thought as being irrational or against her wishes because she has had a couple of accidents before. patient reports that whenever she has such thoughts of cars hitting her, her heart starts beating faster and her palms get sweaty. She reports that this continues throughout the way until she reached her destination. Similarly while taking any tests she would worry if she'll be able to perform well and feels that her heart is pacing. However these thoughts and physical symptoms get relieved once the test is over. Due to the above complaints patient reports that her life is getting affected and she would have performed better on the tests if she was calmer while attempting the questions. With these complaints she visited the therapist.
Current Mental Status Examination: Thought: Worries about meeting with an accident
Issues discussed in Current Session: Session focussed on decreasing the anxiety symptoms
Action Plan: Application of the grounding technique taught in the session while driving
